ca.ualbert.cs.tasko

Class BidList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.BidList

  • public class BidList
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by chase on 2/23/2018. Represents a List of Bid Objects, Has functionality to return minimum Bid, return a bid associated with a UserID, along with typical ArrayList functionality.
    See Also:
    Bid

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BidList()
      Initializes a Bidlist to be an ArrayList of Bids

        public void addAll(java.util.Collection<Bid> bids)
        Adds multiple bids at once to a BidList
        Parameters:

      • getBid

        public Bid getBid(java.lang.String UserID)
        Get a specific Bid from the BidList that matches with a UserID
        Parameters:
        UserID - the Users ID used to compare bids in the BidList
        Returns:
        Returns A bid if such a bid is matching, or null if no bid matches with a UserID

      • getMinBid

        public Bid getMinBid()
        Sorts the BidList in Ascending Order Based Upon Value and Returns the first Bid.
        Returns:
        The Bid in BidList with the lowest monetary value

      • hasBid

        public java.lang.Boolean hasBid(Bid bid)
        Checks if a Bidlist contains a specific Bid
        Parameters:
        bid - The Bid object that is trying to be found in a BidList
        Returns:
        True if the Bid is in the Bidlist or False if not

      • removeBid

        public void removeBid(Bid bid)
        Remove a Bid from a BidList
        Parameters:
        bid - a Bid object

      • getBids

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bid> getBids()
        Returns the Bidlist
        Returns:
        A Bidlist (ArrayList)

      • getSize

        public int getSize()

      • sortBids

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bid> sortBids()
        Sorts Bids in a Bid List based on value of Bid, The lower Bids get out first.
        Returns:
        returns a Sorted BidList in Ascending Order(In terms of Bid Value)

      • get

        public Bid get(int index)
        Get a specific bid from a BidList, based on a index
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the Bid we are trying to return
        Returns:
        A Bid object found at index in the BidList
